Features of Chennaimoms:

Blogs Chennaimoms.com strives to be the de facto medium of self expression for mothers, and blogs are the primary way mothers in our community communicate about issues they care about, not to mention have some fun too.

Participating moms in our website blog about hopes and beliefs, opinion on subjects they care about, their every day experiences, poetry, cooking recipes, home making tips and so on.

Q&A Chennaimoms.com also offers forums where mothers can ask questions and receive experienced answers from other mothers. Information available on the website ranges from best school for my kid, arranging a play date for your kid, kid friendly outings in Chennai, family friendly travel destinations, reference to a good pediatrician in your area, or whom to contact for swimming lessons for your 3 year old, to name a few.

Groups Mothers can also form groups based on their interest or location. For instance, moms who send their kids to Kendriya Vidyalaya school have a group and discuss various issues related to the school in that. Moms have also created groups on location like â€˜Gandhi Nagar momsâ€™ through which they arrange meet-ups in parks, discuss good restaurants in that area and more.

Finding and becoming friends with other Moms Our site provides tools by way of checklists for moms, to find and become friends with other moms who have similar interests. One can search for moms in their locality or by their interests and become their friends. This helps them in extending the friendship beyond the website into the real world. One can also search for existing friends online and add them to their group of friends.

Why Chennaimoms.com? Why not some other site? We provide a lot of Chennai specific information like reviews on local schools and hospitals. You can also meet mothers in your locality in Chennai and make friends. Moms in our site also conduct a lot of activities like monthly fun meet ups, visits to charity organizations, contests etc.

Chennaimoms site also list various tools like pregnancy checklist, packing your hospital bag, provision list, vaccination schedule for babies, kids online safety for tweens and teens, grandmotherâ€™s home remedies etc.

Is it safe? Yes, we take extreme care to keep the site safe.

Anybody can read information to but to interact with moms, one has to verify her email and cell phone. This proven identify makes our site a safe place for moms to communicate.
